p: The treatments were tested in constant proportions of equipotent concentrations, ranging from 0.0625 to 1 times the respective IC 50 value that was determined for each treatment (Fig. 3a). The slope m was also determined from the linear regression of the median effect of the plots (Eq. 3), as they reflected the sigmoidicity of the dose–response curves and were used for the calculation of normalized concentrations and treatment reduction indices (Fig. 3b).
